Package org.yamcs.client

Interface ConnectionListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EventListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PacketViewer, ProcessorControlClient
    public interface ConnectionListener
extends EventListener
    A connection listener interface for clients connecting to a yamcs server.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void connected​(String url)
      Called after a successful connection to the yamcs server has been established.
      void connecting​(String url)
      Called right before the initial connection to yamcs is being made.
      void connectionFailed​(String url, ClientException exception)
      Called when the initial connection to the yamcs server has failed, e.g. the maximum number of retry attempts has exceeded.
      void disconnected()
      Called when the connection to the yamcs server is closed.
      void log​(String message)
      Used to log messages.

    • Method Detail

      • connecting

        void connecting​(String url)
        Called right before the initial connection to yamcs is being made.
        Parameters:
        url - the url of the yamcs server

      • connected

        void connected​(String url)
        Called after a successful connection to the yamcs server has been established.

        Note: when using a re-connecting YamcsConnector, this method is also called after a successful re-connection attempt.

        Parameters:
        url - the url of the yamcs server

      • connectionFailed

        void connectionFailed​(String url,
                      ClientException exception)
        Called when the initial connection to the yamcs server has failed, e.g. the maximum number of retry attempts has exceeded.
        Parameters:
        url - the url of the yamcs server
        exception - Optional cause of the connection failure, may be null.

      • disconnected

        void disconnected()
        Called when the connection to the yamcs server is closed.

      • log

        void log​(String message)
        Used to log messages.
        Parameters:
        message - the messages to be logged
